content: Sing alleluia, the Lord is risen;
He is risen indeed, alleluia!
My Lord, He died for a Kingdom to redeem
The hearts of men.
Now my people, don't you weep;
He has risen from His sleep.
He lives again, alleluia!
My Lord came forth like the morning
With the splendour of the sun,
Came triumphant from the womb,
From the darkness of the tomb,
The victory won, alleluia!
My Lord united our mountain
With the everlasting hill.
Now the seasons and the sea sing His
Song of victory, rocks and rills, alleluia!
My Lord renewed all creation
That had waited late and long.
Now we all, with one accord, live and
Love the Risen Lord.
This our song: all alleluia!
